name: Exakis
tagline: Success is the Performance of the Consultants.
description:
Exakis is a consulting and technical expertise. Since its inception in 2001, Exakis voluntarily positioned on a very active development skills focused on business platform Microsoft. With over 300 employees, Exakis achieved in 2009 a turnover of more than 24m euros.
Distributed over a network of eight offices in France, Exakis teams involved in projects design and management of infrastructure, the implementation and maintenance of software applications, the security of information systems and the accompaniment in the steering, project management and change and integration of ERP / CRM solutions.

Convinced that success is the performance of consultants, Exakis continuously invests in training its employees including the establishment of a university internal systems of internal knowledge management and capitalization. Dynamics Exakis is part of the Group in 2010 with the acquisition of the company Intactive (specialist ERP and CRM), and in 2008 with the acquisition of I'FORM (Specialist Training authorized Training Center Microsoft CPLS). Exakis benefits from the presence of two financial institutions: Naxicap Partner and IRDI.
